text: @SpeakerPelosi You’ve so busy sitting on your keister eating chocolate ice cream. You have brain freeze and have no clue what’s going on out in the world. Nor do you really care. Otherwise, you would stop holding up the Coronavirus Stimulus Bill.🥶🤪
